items.title: Intel Sustainability Website
items.description: I leveraged React and Bootstrap to create a website mockup showcasing Intel's sustainability timeline.

items.title: Flower Shop Website Redesign
items.description: I redesigned a flower shop’s website to transform a flat, text-heavy layout into a vibrant, community-focused experience. The update introduced clear visual hierarchy, responsive design, and refreshed branding that highlights seasonal offerings and the shop’s local charm. After using the first link below, you can compare using the second link to the original design

items.title: Minders: Calendar and Task Manager
items.description: An in-development task management app for iOS and Apple Watch focused on ADHD-friendly feedback and overload reduction.

items.title: Roamway Travel Planner (Swift-native)
items.description: I am developing a smart, personal itinerary builder app for iOS and iPadOS, leveraging Apple's frameworks like MapKit and the Apple Intelligence Foundation Model.

items.title: Nevada EMPOWER Website (React/TypeScript/SQL)
items.description: Working alongside one other developer, I migrated the entire frontend codebase to React and TypeScript, ensuring type safety and maintainability, and boosting developer velocity. I then drove a full design overhaul—realigning the site with brand standards, enhancing responsiveness, and improving accessibility.

items.title: JS Hangman
items.description: I developed a Hangman game in JavaScript as my first personal project, later enhancing it with responsive web design to improve usability across devices.
